text: "The canard some Trump allies are floating--that a public release of the report would violate the special counsel regulations--is false. The regulations set a floor, not a ceiling, on the amount of transparency." @neal_katyal:
author: CKummer

text: "It is unpretentious but challenging. Low-calorie but lush. No food is as democratic as the egg." Read @Jacques_Pepin's charming defense and find yourself drawn inexorably to the omelet pan:
author: CKummer

text: Moving, long piece about losing the family farm after generations despite a younger brother with a "g*d-tier" work ethic. The only solution for small dairy farms is Canadian-style supply control, and the author supplies links to support one.
author: CKummer

text: "There were monkeypods, 'planted as seedlings no taller than chives,' as Mr. Merwin wrote, in impeccable dactylic tetrameter, in 'What Is a Garden?'" Gorgeously written @margalitfox tribute to W.S. Merwin:
author: CKummer
